contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 3, 1981 D NSW State Championships (B Grade)
NSW State Championships (B Grade) 20 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest NSW State Championships nsw-state-championships-b-grade
Australia
B Grade
Main Street
Wollongong Town Hall, Wollongong, New South Wales, Australia This contest trialed a score sheet for the adjudicator broken up into sections eg 10 points for Tuning, ensemble, balance etc. This produced the three way tie shown here. Championship was total of Test and own choice. in the event of a tie, the winner is the winner of the test piece. The score sheet was ditched after this.
Own Choice Draw 2 ; 4 ; 1 ; 3
Sept. 16, 2014, 3:08 p.m. Oct. 2, 2016, 4:25 a.m.
1 Sutherland Shire Brass Frank McGuinness Le Roi d'Ys
2 Toronto Brass Ian Wilson Essay [Gregson]
3 Kahibah Bowling Club Band Richard Anderson Four Preludes
4 Yagoona District Band Harry Rudd Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
